
Run this to update the coin_list.Rda file to the most up to date prices. Estimated load time = 15 min. 

```{r}
setwd("~/Desktop/Crypto_Analysis-master")
source("check_packages.R")
check_packages(c("crypto","dplyr"))


coin.list = getCoins() %>%
    select(symbol,name,date,ranknow,close) %>%  
    filter(ranknow %in% c(1:50)) %>%        #Only gets top 50 ranked coins
    dplyr::rename(price = close)

save(coin.list, file = "coin_list.Rda")

```
